title: Port cuDNN RNN bindings to ATen
body_html:
I worked hard to split the commits into atomic chunks, please read them individually!

First commit is already reviewed in #4775.

Some of the changesets aren't actually needed for this PR (they were needed in previous iterations of the patch, but then I refactored the code to not need them). I can easily drop them from the PR if people don't like them, but they might be helpful to others.

  • Turn on wrap_dim behavior for TensorGeometry
  • Add transpose() to TensorGeometry.
  • TensorGeometry constructor from just sizes
  • Support code generation with mixed Tensor/TensorList in output.

Basically, all of the commits before "Port cuDNN RNNs to ATen" are just generalizing code generation / APIs with things that I need for the actual port patch.

According to CI, this introduces a minor GPU regression, which I am going to try to figure out.

body:
I worked hard to split the commits into atomic chunks, please read them individually!

First commit is already reviewed in #4775.

Some of the changesets aren't actually needed for this PR (they were needed in previous iterations of the patch, but then I refactored the code to not need them). I can easily drop them from the PR if people don't like them, but they might be helpful to others.

* Turn on wrap_dim behavior for TensorGeometry
* Add transpose() to TensorGeometry.
* TensorGeometry constructor from just sizes
* Support code generation with mixed Tensor/TensorList in output. 

Basically, all of the commits before "Port cuDNN RNNs to ATen" are just generalizing code generation / APIs with things that I need for the actual port patch.

According to CI, this introduces a minor GPU regression, which I am going to try to figure out.
